page.title: 11TRADES PEOPLE OF WALKINGTON.
page.content: THERE ARE THREE BUILDERS AND A JOINER IN WALKINGTON,ONE OF WHOM SELLS BUILDING MATERIALS,ALL OF THEM BUILD GARAGES,EXTENSIONS etc. THE VILLAGE HAS A GARAGE THAT SELLS SECOND_HAND CARS AND DOES MAINTENANCE. THE VILLAGE HAIRDRESSER CONDUCTS BUSINESS IN HER OWN HOME. THERE IS A PLUMBER IN WALKINGTON WHO TOOK OVER HIS FATHERS BUSINESS. THE VILLAGE HAS THREE PUBLIC HOUSES, THE DOG AND DUCK,THE BARREL,AND THE FERGUSON_FAWSITT ARMS.ALL SERVE FOOD BUT THE LATTER HAS AN EXTENSIVE RESTAURANT.THE BARREL IS AT THE EXACT GEOGRAPHICAL CENTRE OF HUMBERSIDE. THE ONLY SHOP IN WALKINGTON ACTS AS GROCER,GREENGROCER NEWSAGENT AND POST OFFICE.THE VILLAGE TAXI SERVICE ALSO BRINGS THE SCHOOL MEALS FROM A BEVERLEY SCHOOL.
